alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baker, north central Union and east central Columbia Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olustee, or 9 miles east of Lake City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Sanderson and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
